jobDescription: Teza Technologies is looking for an AltData Quantitative Researcher to join our small focused team. The selected candidate will work in a collaborative environment and will be constantly learning on the job, innovating, and working directly with external vendors.  'Big data' is at the core of our business and we are looking for someone who enjoys working with complex and large scale datasets. You will apply techniques from machine learning, text analytics, NLP, computer vision and applied statistics to extract signals from large unstructured and semi-structured data sources.  Responsibilities: Import data from the vendors, clean and store the dataWork with a variety of non-tabular/numerical data sources. Help to make sense of this data and extract economic information out of non-financial data sourcesBuild tools that will help automate the cleaning process of the dataOnboard new data sources and maintain external vendor relationships Requirements: BS, MS, or PhD in Natural Language Processing, Computer Science, or equivalent work experience5 years experience working with production data systems, machine learning techniques, natural language processing and programmingStrong Natural Language Processing experienceProgramming language agnostic, but preference for Python and JavaExperience with Hadoop or other frameworks for working with distributed dataExperience with Amazon Web Services (AWS) or Google Cloud is a plus
